page.title: 06POPULATION & EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Our block has an aging population. This is reflected in the small number of children of school age and younger: 1 Pre-school(0-5years)...7 2 Primary(5-12years)...9 3 Secondary(12-18years)...5 EMPLOYMENT There is very little local employment except in the farming/crofting field.Farming is usually a family concern and crofting is usually only a part-time occupation-a serious pastime,only the elderly make make it their full employment.There are a few jobs in the service industries eg. teacher,postmaster,postman,shop assistants,home-help and lighthouse keeper.Most of the young people move away to try to find employment. Portnahaven and Port Wemyss were essentially fishing/crofting communities.
